        public Disk(int cx,
    int cy,

        Constructor used to initialize/assign variables and instantiate Disk

        cx - is the center x-coordinate of Disk
        cy - is the center y-coordinate of Disk
        radius - is the radius of Disk

        public boolean inside(int x,
             int y)
        Checks if point (x,y) is inside the disk
        Parameters:

        y - -coordinate to check
        Returns:

      • within

        public boolean within(int x,
             int y,
             int w,
             int h)
        Checks if Disk is within bounded rectangle
        Parameters:
        x - -coordinate of upper-left of rectangle
        y - -coordinate of upper-left of rectangle
        w - is width of the rectangle
        h - is height of the rectangle
        Returns:
        true if the disk is within the rectangle given by the parameters (x,y) and width/height. False otherwise

      • distance

        public double distance(int xp,
              int yp)
        Uses the Euclidean formula to calculate the distance between Disk and a point (xp, yp)
        Parameters:
        xp - -coordinate of point to check
        yp - -coordinate of point to check
        Returns:
        the distance between the center of this disk and (xp, yp)

      • distance

        public double distance(Disk d)
        Calculates the distance between this Disk and a separate Disk
        Parameters:
        d -
        Returns:
        the distance between the center of this disk and the center of d

      • overlap

        public boolean overlap(Disk d)
        Checks if this disk is within the boundaries of another disk
        Parameters:
        d -
        Returns:
        true if Disk d overlaps with Disk. False otherwise-
